div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1098 Olbia (mod. Parutino), Ochakov raion, Nikolaev oblast, Ukraine, 1959 Burial: c. 250-225 B.C. Contents: 1 AR, 24 AE. In one room Olbia: 1 hemidr. (as AMNG I.1, pl. 10, 10 [1]) 23 AE (as AMNG I.1, pl. 9, 4 [1], 7 [1], 8 [2], 13 [7], 16 [1], 22 [1], 23 [1], 26-29 [7], 31 [1], 32 [1]) Unc.: 1 AE Disposition: Leningrad (Institute) Information from P. O. Karyszkowski
